fields.summary: Android App Development Brochure – Freelancer Feedback Update

content.text: Today, I reconnected with the freelancer after reviewing their initial feedback on the Android App Development brochure. While they kept the structure intact, they missed providing any real critique — no comments, edits, or suggestions on content, tone, or CTA.
Share specific feedback on headings, emotional flow, clarity, and CTA strength
Next version is expected to include detailed feedback and actionable suggestions to improve content quality and impact.

content.text: Hire three freelancers in Robotic Engineering

fields.summary: Build a Panel of Freelance Experts in Emerging Domains-Robotic Engineering

content.text: As part of building the Robotics Engineering talent pool, I’ve shortlisted three expert freelancers from Upwork based on their proven skills in ROS/ROS2, automation, and robotic system design.
Robotics Systems, ROS, Gazebo/RViz, CAD, Automation
Designed 5+ robotic systems including robotic arms and rovers. Strong background in ROS, simulations, and hardware-software integration.
Robotics, ROS/ROS2, Autonomous Navigation, Computer Vision
4+ years of experience with ROS-based autonomous systems, Jetson boards, LIDAR, object detection, and deep learning integration.
Robotics Engineering, Product Design, Hardware Prototyping
12+ years of experience in robotics and smart product development. Specialized in automation, prototyping, and end-to-end product design.
Today, I connected with three freelancers for Robotics Engineering roles on Upwork:
– Expert in ROS, Gazebo, CAD, and automation
– Specializes in ROS/ROS2, autonomous navigation, and computer vision
– Experienced in robotics prototyping and product design
Also started searching for more freelancers to expand the robotics talent pool.
with expertise in robotics systems, ROS/ROS2, automation, and prototyping, aligning with our current project requirements.
with these shortlisted experts to discuss project scope, availability, and collaboration terms.
with previously connected freelancers to check on availability, share updated requirements, and maintain engagement for upcoming tasks.
– Machine Learning, Cybersecurity, and Robotics – across multiple platforms.
Connected with freelancers who replied to our initial outreach and discussed project requirements with them.
Followed up with freelancers who have not yet responded.
to expand the potential talent pool.
– PhD AI, Prof., CV/NLP/ML expert, 10+ yrs R&D – Strong academic + applied AI fit.
– Sr. Data Scientist (6+ yrs), CV/NLP/ML, GCP – Strong applied AI background.
– PhD, AI+IoT, network security – Good IoT/AI mix.
– PhD CS, 15+ yrs AI/ML tools – Enterprise-grade AI expertise.
– PhD NLP, 7+ yrs R&D, 9+ yrs coding – Ideal for LLM/NLP reviews.
– ML Dev (LLM, CV, RL, Analytics) – Full modern AI stack.
– CV/AI Engineer, team lead – Strong applied CV focus.
All profiles meet requirements; best per domain

MLOps, Machine Learning, LLMs, RAG, AWS

content.text: Hire 3 freelancers in Cyber Security domain

fields.summary: Build a Panel of Freelance Experts in Emerging Domains-Cybersecurity

content.text: As part of building the talent pool for the Cybersecurity domain, I have successfully identified and shortlisted three expert freelancers based on skill, experience, and relevance to our requirements.
All three profiles have been carefully researched and shortlisted from Upwork.
The following freelancers have been finalized:
– $85/hr – Expert in Azure, DevSecOps, and incident response
– $150/hr – Specializes in threat mitigation and enterprise system security
– $50/hr – Focused on cloud security, compliance (ISO 27001, SOC2, GDPR), and network architecture
All three have been selected to support different cybersecurity needs within our ecosystem.
